title: The Right-Wing Grass Roots Scored Big in 2010. But 2022 Was Far Different.
description: Unlike the Tea Party movement in 2010, the pro-Trump grass roots proved to be more liability than asset when it came to winning elections in 2022.
media:credit: Hilary Swift for The New York Times
media:description: Supporters of Doug Mastriano at a rally hosted by former President Donald J. Trump in Latrobe, Pa., last week.
